title: HorrorMusicAmbience1 Music
longDescription:
🔗YoutubeDemo.

https://youtu.be/k7hMdlRXF5c < YOUTUBE PREVIEW



📖Overview.

The Creepy Horror Ambience Music Pack is a high-quality collection of spine-chilling music, perfect for enhancing the atmosphere in games, movies, animations, and various other projects. This pack consists of 10 terrifying tracks, each designed to evoke different feelings and moods. From intense fear and suspense to eerie and mysterious settings, these music pieces cater to a wide range of scary scenes, monster encounters, thrilling moments, and mysterious landscapes.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Atmospheres: A total of 10 tracks offer various creepy and haunting moods.
  • High-Quality Sound: Each music piece is professionally crafted by expert audio engineers for exceptional quality.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for a wide range of projects, including games, movies, animations, and more.
  • Emotional Expressions: The music effectively captures emotions like fear, tension, and thrills.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • CimmerianDescent
  • CursedRelics
  • DesolateSouls
  • ForsakenRealms
  • MacabreRituals
  • MournfulRemnants
  • ObsidianVeil
  • OminousPresence
  • SinisterResonance
  • WickedNight



⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
